line_1: Which, meteor-like, darts through the hemisphere;
line_2: He saw her shoot before him as a star

line_1: Was seen o'er all the Hemisphere,
line_2: DARK was the Night, and not a Star
A Gallaxy of Worthies now appear,

line_1: The brightest Stars in Learning's Hemisphere:
line_2: Whose awful Busts around the Grot appear,
